description:
Devoted to helping you obtain the justice you deserve following a debilitating injury or devastating loss caused by someone else's negligence, the legal professionals at the Law Office of David L Hood in Rock Hill, South Carolina, are fully prepared to fight hard on your behalf to improve your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation for the damages you incurred as the result of any of the following:

• Motor vehicle accidents
• Defective products and defective medical devices
• Medical malpractice, pharmacy malpractice, drug injuries, birth injuries and other similar claims
• Traumatic brain injuries
• Mesothelioma and toxic exposure
• Other preventable tragedies

Regarded nationally as one of the country's top trial lawyers, the firm's founder, David L. Hood, is Notable peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and has received many other top rankings and endorsements from his peers for his outstanding legal abilities and high ethical standards. Committed to superior client service, he has also received Martindale-Hubbell's Gold Client Champion award as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from those he has served.

Originally founded in 1991 in Murrells Inlet, the law firm now has 12 total offices throughout South Carolina, establishing itself as the state's premier legal practice for those in need. Furthermore, it also provides invaluable assistance with Social Security Disability claims and appeals.

Regardless of the cause of your suffering, you can begin the process of securing a brighter and more financially stable future for yourself and your family by contacting the Law Office of David L Hood and taking advantage of its free initial consultation. It also offers virtual consultations in today's uncertain environment in an effort to help keep you and your loved ones safe.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
